name: 王正豪
objective:
先備條件：以具備Python技能和機器學習基礎知識學習，熟悉深度學習的同學優先。
在問題導向學習的課程中，學生將學習如何應用機器學習算法在大數據上。
Prerequisite: Hands on skills with Python and basic knowledge of Machine Learning are required. Familiarity with deep learning is preferred.
Abstract:
In this problem based class, students will learn how to apply machine learning algorithms on big data-set;
schedule:
在基於研究導向學習的課程中，學生將學習如何透過機器學習演算法蒐集大數據集資料。
       * 基礎的NoSQL資料庫
        * Google Big Table表
        * Mapreduce演算法
        * Hadoop框架
        *Spark數據分析

學生分小組進行下列人工智慧專題研究，研究成果以商品化或出版學術論文為導向；
* 糖尿病性視網膜病變;圖像與健康指標的相關性研究(延續UC既有學術專題)
* 3D臉部模型的創建和分析
*影片摘要(UC與NTUT共同合作)
*手術影片
*監視影片(包括穿戴式攝影機)
*市場分析(延續UC既有學術專題)
*開發影片串流/處理平台(延續UC既有學術專題)
*在GPS匱乏的環境中進行室內建模和定位(延續UC既有學術專題)

In this research based class, students will learn how to apply machine learning algorithms on big data-set;

        * Basics of NoSQL database
        * Google Big Table
        * Mapreduce algorithm
        * Hadoop Framework
        * Spark

Students will split to groups from the beginning to work on one of the following projects with an intention for commercialization and/or publication;

* Diabetic Retinopathy; study of the correlation of retinal images with health indicators  - Continuation of a senior project started at UC
* 3D face mask creation and analysis
* Video summarization - Continuation of a research collaboration between UC and NTUT
* Surgical Videos
* Surveillance Videos - including body worn cameras
* Market Analysis - Continuation of a senior project started at UC by NTUT students
* Development of a video streaming / processing Platform-Continuation of a senior project started at UC
* Indoor mapping and localization in GPS-deprived environment -Continuation of a senior project started at UC
scorePolicy:
Class Attendance: 30%
Project Presentation: 30%
Term Project: 40%
materials: Slides compiled from various resources such as open courses, documents, and online tutorials.
